name: Nature`s Secrets Godapara Anti Dandruff Shampoo
description: Enriched with the natural goodness of godapara, traditionally used for generations to purify the scalp, our anti-dandruff shampoo effectively prevents dandruff, leaving you feeling more confident and your scalp more purified, refreshed and soothed. Enhanced with conditioning activity, the shampoo leaves your hair soft and smooth. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
